lon.description: Instrument geolocation; longitude east of the location of the instrument (+ for east - for west).

lat.description: Instrument geolocation; latitude north of the location of the instrument (+ for north; - for south).

funding.description: The individual or organization which has provided all or part of the finances associated with the resource.

altitude.description: Grid of altitudes upon which the retrieved target VMR (Volume Mixing Ratio) profile as well as pressure and temperature profiles are reported.

altitude_instrument.description: Altitude of the location of the instrument.

datetime.description: Time specified indicates the middle of the period over which the observation was made.

integration_time.description: Duration of the measurements corresponding to the retrieved profile.

pressure_independent.description: Effective air pressure at each altitude.

temperature_independent.description: Effective air temperature at each altitude.

altitude_boundaries.description: Upper and lower boundaries of the layers for which partial columns are reported. 2D matrix providing the layer boundaries used for vertical profile retrieval.

surface_pressure_independent.description: Surface pressure measured at the observation site.

surface_temperature_independent.description: Surface temperature measured at the observation site.

angle_solar_zenith_astronomical.description: Astronomical solar zenith angle in solar absorption mode, the sun defines the line of sight.

angle_solar_azimuth.description: Azimuth angle of the sun in solar absorption mode, the sun defines the line of sight.

ch4_column_partial_absorption_solar.description: CH4 partial columns in the retrieval layers.

ch4_column_partial_absorption_solar_apri.description: CH4 a priori partial columns in the retrieval layers.

ch4_column_absorption_solar.description: Retrieved total vertical CH4 column between boundaries of altitude grid.

ch4_column_absorption_solar_apriori.description: A-priori total vertical CH4 column between boundaries of altitude grid.

ch4_column_absorption_solar_avk.description: Total vertical column averaging kernel for CH4 derived from mixing ratio averaging kernel.

ch4_column_absorption_solar_uncertainty_.description: Total random uncertainty on the retrieved total vertical CH4 columns.
Total systematic uncertainty on the retrieved total vertical CH4 columns.

ch4_mixing_ratio_volume_absorption_solar.description: Vertical CH4 profile from solar absorption measurements.
Averaging kernel matrix (AVK) of the retrieved vertical CH4 profile, in VMR/VMR (Volume Mixing Ratio) units.
Total random error covariance matrix associated with the retrieved CH4 vertical profiles, in VMR (Volume Mixing Ratio) units.
Total systematic error covariance matrix associated with the retrieved CH4 vertical profiles, in VMR (Volume Mixing Ratio) units.

lon.description: Instrument geolocation; longitude east of the location of the instrument (+ for east - for west).

lat.description: Instrument geolocation; latitude north of the location of the instrument (+ for north; - for south).

altitude.description: Grid of altitudes upon which the retrieved target vmr profile as well as pressure and temperature profiles are reported.

altitude_instrument.description: Altitude of the location of the instrument.

datetime.description: Time specified indicates the middle of the period over which the observation was made.

integration_time.description: Duration of the measurements corresponding to the retrieved profile.

pressure_independent.description: Effective air pressure at each altitude.

temperature_independent.description: Effective air temperature at each altitude.

altitude_boundaries.description: Upper and lower boundaries of the layers for which partial columns are reported. 2D matrix providing the layer boundaries used for vertical profile retrieval.

surface_pressure_independent.description: Surface pressure measured at the observation site.

surface_temperature_independent.description: Surface temperature measured at the observation site.

angle_solar_zenith_astronomical.description: Astronomical solar zenith angle in solar absorption mode, the sun defines the line of sight.

angle_solar_azimuth.description: Azimuth angle of the sun in solar absorption mode, the sun defines the line of sight.

h2o_column_absorption_solar.description: Total vertical column of H2O adopted in the target gas retrieval.

h2o_mixing_ratio_volume_absorption_solar.description: Vertical profile of H2O adopted in the target gas retrieval in VMR (Volume Mixing Ratio) units.

co_column_absorption_solar.description: Retrieved total vertical CO column between boundaries of altitude grid.

co_column_absorption_solar_apriori.description: A-priori total vertical CO column between boundaries of altitude grid.

co_column_absorption_solar_avk.description: Total vertical column averaging kernel for CO derived from mixing ratio averaging kernel.

co_column_absorption_solar_uncertainty_r.description: Total random uncertainty on the retrieved total vertical CO columns.

co_column_absorption_solar_uncertainty_s.description: Total systematic uncertainty on the retrieved total vertical CO columns.

co_column_partial_absorption_solar.description: CO partial columns in the retrieval layers.

co_column_partial_absorption_solar_aprio.description: CO a priori partial columns in the retrieval layers.

co_mixing_ratio_volume_absorption_solar.description: Vertical CO profile from solar absorption measurements.

co_mixing_ratio_volume_absorption_solar_.description: Averaging kernel matrix (AVK) of the retrieved vertical CO profile, in VMR/VMR (Volume Mixing Ratio) units.
Total random error covariance matrix associated with the retrieved CO vertical profiles, in VMR (Volume Mixing Ratio) units.
Total systematic error covariance matrix associated with the retrieved CO vertical profiles, in VMR (Volume Mixing Ratio) units.

lon.description: Longitude east of the location of the instrument.

lat.description: Latitude north of the location of the instrument.

o3_vertical_column_density_mol.description: O3 vertical column density in molecules cm-2.

o3_vertical_column_density_du.description: O3 vertical column density in DU.

error_o3_vertical_column_density_mol.description: Error in O3 vertical column density in molecules cm-2.

error_o3_vertical_column_density_du.description: Error in O3 vertical column density in DU.

o3_air_mass_factor.description: Air mass factor associated with the total stratospheric vertical column of the target gas.

lon.description: Longitude east of the location of the instrument.

lat.description: Latitude north of the location of the instrument.

o3_vertical_column_density_mol.description: O3 vertical column density in molecules cm-2.

o3_vertical_column_density_du.description: O3 vertical column density in DU.

error_o3_vertical_column_density_mol.description: Error in O3 vertical column density in molecules cm-2.

error_o3_vertical_column_density_du.description: Error in O3 vertical column density in DU.

o3_air_mass_factor.description: Air mass factor associated with the total stratospheric vertical column of the target gas.

lon.description: Longitude east of the location of the instrument.

lat.description: Latitude north of the location of the instrument.

alt.description: Altitude of the location of the instrument.

time.description: Elapsed flight time since released as primary variable.

press.description: Effective air pressure at each altitude.

temp.description: Effective air temperature at each altitude.

po3.description: Level partial pressure of ozone in Pascals.

wspd.description: Wind speed in meters per second.

intt.description: Temperature where sample is measured in degrees Kelvin.

o3cur.description: Measured ozonesonde cell current with no corrections applied.

batv.description: Applied voltage measured across the pump motor.

pcur.description: Electrical current measured through the pump motor.

pott.description: Temperature a parcel of air would reach if all the water vapor in the parcel were to condense, releasing its latent heat, and the parcel was brought adiabatically to a standard reference pressure, usually 1000 hPa.

o3con.description: Level mixing ratio of ozone in ppmv.

xoz.description: Total uncertainty in the calculation of the ozone partial pressure as a composite of the individual uncertainties contribution. Uncertainties due to systematic bias are assumed as random and following a random normal distribution. The uncertainty calculation also accounts for the increased uncertainty incurred by homogenizing the data record.

lon.description: Instrument geolocation; longitude east of the location of the instrument (+ for east - for west).

lat.description: Instrument geolocation; latitude north of the location of the instrument (+ for north; - for south).

altitude_instrument.description: Altitude of the location of the instrument.

datetime.description: Time specified indicates the middle of the period over which the observation was made.

integration_time.description: Duration of the measurements corresponding to the retrieved profile.

pressure_independent.description: Effective air pressure at each altitude.

temperature_independent.description: Effective air temperature at each altitude.

datetime_start.description: Time specified indicates the start of the period over which the observation was made.

datetime_stop.description: Time specified indicates the end of the period over which the observation was made.

angle_view_azimuth.description: The azimuth viewing direction of the instrument using north as the reference plane and increasing clockwise (0 for north, 90 for east and so on).

angle_view_zenith_mean.description: The zenith viewing direction of the instrument.

o3_column_partial_emission.description: O3 partial columns in the retrieval layers.

o3_mixing_ratio_volume_emission_uncertai.description: Random uncertainty for the retrieved Ozone profile.
Systematic uncertainty for the retrieved ozone profile.

o3_mixing_ratio_volume_emission_avk.description: Averaging kernel matrix (AVK) of the retrieved vertical O3 profile, in VMR/VMR (volume mixin ratio) units.

o3_mixing_ratio_volume_emission_apriori_.description: Unitless value of the contribution of the a priori to the measurement.

o3_mixing_ratio_volume_emission.description: Vertical O3 profile from solar absorption measurements.

opacity_atmospheric_emission.description: Mean opacity of the atmosphere during the time of the measurement.

h2o_column_derived.description: Total vertical column of H2O adopted in the target gas retrieval.

lat.description: Instrument geolocation; latitude north of the location of the instrument (+ for north; - for south).

funding.description: The individual or organization which has provided all or part of the finances associated with the resource.

altitude.description: Grid of altitudes upon which the retrieved target vmr profile as well as pressure and temperature profiles are reported.

altitude_instrument.description: Altitude of the location of the instrument.

datetime.description: Time specified indicates the middle of the period over which the observation was made.

integration_time.description: Duration of the measurements corresponding to the retrieved profile.

pressure_independent.description: Effective air pressure at each altitude.

temperature_independent.description: Effective air temperature at each altitude.

datetime_start.description: Time specified indicates the start of the period over which the observation was made.

datetime_stop.description: Time specified indicates the end of the period over which the observation was made.

pressure_independent_source.description: Pressure profile source (e.g. NCEP, Sonde, ECMWF etc.).

temperature_independent_source.description: Temperature profile source (e.g. Lidar, NCEP, Sonde, ECMWF).

column_partial_independent.description: Vertical profile of partial columns of dry air number densities, for conversion between VMR (volume mixin ratio) and partial column profile.

column_partial_independent_source.description: Partial columns of air source (e.g. NCEP; Sonde; ECMWF etc.).

altitude_boundaries.description: Upper and lower boundaries of the layers for which partial columns are reported. 2D matrix providing the layer boundaries used for vertical profile retrieval.

angle_solar_azimuth.description: Azimuth angle of the sun in solar absorption mode, the sun defines the line of sight.

angle_solar_zenith_astronomical.description: Astronomical solar zenith angle in solar absorption mode, the sun defines the line of sight.

angle_view_azimuth.description: The azimuth viewing direction of the instrument using north as the reference plane and increasing clockwise (0 for north, 90 for east and so on).

angle_view_zenith.description: The zenith viewing direction of the instrument.

latitude.description: The latitude of the profile at each altitude (+ for north, - for south).

longitude.description: The longitude of the profile at each altitude (+ for east, - for west).

cloud_conditions.description: Sky conditions; Possible Values: clear-sky; thin clouds; thick clouds; broken clouds; [empty]. [empty] means that the cloud retrieval is not successful, not possible or missing.

aerosol_optical_depth_stratospheric_inde.description: The total stratospheric aerosol optical depth used for the retrieval is based on a climatology; model; or auxiliary measurements.

o3_column_stratospheric_scatter_solar_ze.description: Total tropospheric vertical column of target gas retrieved from zenith DOAS measurements.
Total random uncertainty on the total tropospheric column (expressed in same units as the column) (without smoothing error) retrieved from zenith DOAS measurements.
Total systematic uncertainty on the retrieved total tropospheric column (expressed in same units as the column) (without smoothing error) retrieved from zenith DOAS measurements.
Averaging kernel matrix associated with the total tropospheric vertical column of the target gas retrieved from zenith DOAS measurements.
A-priori total tropospheric vertical column of target gas associated with the column retrieval from zenith DOAS measurements.

o3_column_partial_scatter_solar_zenith_a.description: Vertical profile of apriori of partial columns per layer associated with the AMF calculation.

o3_column_slant_scatter_solar_zenith.description: Zenith slant column density of target gas corresponding to datetime.

o3_column_stratospheric_scatter_solar_ze.description: Air mass factor associated with the total stratospheric vertical column of the target gas retrieved from zenith DOAS measurements.

o3_mixing_ratio_volume_scatter_solar_zen.description: A-priori target vertical profile associated with the profile retrieval from zenith DOAS measurements.

lon.description: Instrument geolocation; longitude east of the location of the instrument (+ for east - for west).

lat.description: Instrument geolocation; latitude north of the location of the instrument (+ for north; - for south).

o3_number_density_abs_diff_res_altitude_.description: Vertical resolution: NDACC-lidar-standardized based on digital filter cut-off frequency.
Normalized frequency to use with Transfer Function (Nyquist=0.5).
Transfer Function of Digital Filter used.
Distance from impulse to use with Impulse Response (0 at location of Impulse).
Vertical resolution: Full-width at half-maximum (FWHM) of impulse response.

o3_mixing_ratio_volume_derived.description: Vertical O3 profile from solar absorption measurements.

o3_column_partial_derived.description: Derived from lidar and independent source.

o3_column_partial_derived_uncertainty_or.description: Uncertainty of the derived partial ozone column (following PI's historical definition).

o3_column_partial_derived_uncertainty_co.description: Uncertainty of the derived partial ozone column (NDACC-lidar-standardized definition).
